title: Emote Bugs?
body:
I only have the Thumbs up and Conqueror emotes. I loaded them in the collection tabs. They won't appear during the Ascension rotating game mode. Though I've seen other players use theirs. I went to check to see if I had saved my Emotes properly. I did. I removed and reset them in the position I wanted. 

And ran into, "Sorry! Something went wrong saving your emote loadout. Please try again or contact player support if the problem persists. Error Code: EMO3"

The problem is persisting.

replies.body: Do me a favor and double check your [**permissions settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as well as running a quick repair to make sure all the game files and working together properly. Be sure to let me know if that doesn't help so we can try a couple other things to get those working again!
Permission settings fine. Now getting Error EMO1 and EMO5

I've been having the same issue as well. Sometimes mine just won't load in game, even if i set them beforehand, and other game they're there with no problems.
 {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
